K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-056:328a-0: @328a dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-056:328a-1: sangs rgyas kun nas thogs med ston la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-056:328a-2: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-056:328b-0: @328b ka ba tsa katna la la ta sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-056:328b-1: chu la lan bdun bzlas te gdong bkrus na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-056:328b-2: skye bo thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-056:328b-3: de'i cho ga la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi sbyan sngar chu bzhag la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas te 'thungs la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-056:328b-4: dro khar kha zas 'o ma dang sbags te bza' ba lta bur zhag bdun gyi bar du byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-056:328b-5: nyin gcig kyang yi ge shloo ka stong lobs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-056:328b-6: shloo ka stong lobs pa'i gzungs rdzogs so ////
